p: The flavanonols 3,4′,6,8-tetrahydroxyflavanone-7- C-glucoside ( 21) and (2 S,3 S)-6,8,3′-triprenyl-dihydromorin ( 22) from the methanol extracts of the aerial ( Ateba et al., 2016a) and underground ( Ateba et al., 2016b) parts of E. laurentii, respectively, were also identified for the first time in the genus. Among flavanones, prunin ( 42) was isolated from the twigs of E. robustum ( Awouafack et al., 2018).
